venue.address_1: 460C Harrison Ave Boston, MA 02118. Our GPS address is 365 Albany Street, Boston MA 02118
venue.name: SOWA Vinatge Market

item.description:
Free Meetup at SoWa Vintage Market 

Thursday, June 30th starting at 6:00 pm

Attention: Stylists, photographers, vintage vixens, designers, home decorators, event planners, and anyone in our group that seeks the BEST resource in Boston for truly special and unique fashion, jewelry, accessories, and furniture / home decor!

Join us for this special opportunity to meet the curators of SoWa Vintage Market - Stephanie Pernice and John Warren. Stephanie and John will discuss their vintage market business and how you can best utilize SoWa Vintage Market's amazing array of antique and vintage offerings. This informative yet relaxed overview will include the chance to ask questions and collaborate with other members of our group.

If you are a fashion stylist seeking the best in truly distictictive vintage, a photographer that needs an incredible piece to use as a "prop" for your next shoot, or are inspired by the "story" vintage and antiques tell - you won't want to miss the chance to learn more about SoWa Vinatge Market directly from the innovators who created the concept and brought it to the South End. 

 

Please visit the SoWa website for additional information:

http://www.sowavintagemarket.com/

 

This is a FREE Meetup and space will be limited - please RSVP as soon as possible to secure your space.

Thank you for directing any questions regarding next Thursday to me via the Meetup site - please do not contact Stephanie and John at SoWa Vintage Market. 

See you Thursday, June 30th at 6:00 pm!
item.how_to_find_us: Inside the brick building - look for the signs at the doors facing the parking lot.
item.name: Meetup at SoWa Vintage Market!
